name: A Non-Exhaustive List Of Video Game Deaths (That Just Happens To Be Ten)
name_original: A Non-Exhaustive List Of Video Game Deaths (That Just Happens To Be Ten)
description:
My entry for the List Jam! It is an interactive list. A list, but with perhaps one bell, or maybe a whistle. Fullscreen isn't required but is probably more comfortable.

The list entries are presented in an order for visual fun, but you can click on them in any order you like - once you've seen them, they won't repeat.

Feel free to comment if you are deeply tormented by not knowing which any of the deaths refer to and want to know!
